data.enText: enjoying harming others; morally bad and cruel
having a harmful effect on people; morally bad
connected with the Devil and with what is bad in the world

data.chText: 讨厌的；令人作呕的；使人不舒服的
倒霉的时候（或日子、时刻）
data.enText: the time when you have to do sth difficult or unpleasant
an unpleasant drink that is a mixture of different things
a force that causes bad things to happen; morally bad behaviour

data.chText: 善与恶永不休止的斗争
data.enText: the eternal struggle between good and evil

data.chText: 你不能睁着眼睛瞎说世界上没有罪恶。
data.enText: You cannot pretend there's no evil in the world.
a bad or harmful thing; the bad effect of sth
the less unpleasant of two unpleasant choices

data.chText: 无法避免的坏事；不得已的事
data.enText: a thing that is bad or that you do not like but which you must accept for a particular reason

simple_means.memory_skill: e 加强 + vil 卑劣 → 十分卑劣 → 邪恶

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，可用于修饰人或事物。

ex.chText: 他们谴责种族主义是不道德的。

synonyms.bx: 形容人时，特指道德上邪恶、不良的，程度强于 bad，含有加害于人、罪恶歹毒的意思；形容事物时，强调不道德的。

ex.chText: 那鸡肉尝起来不新鲜，但我们没有不良反应。
ex.enText: The chicken didn't taste fresh, but we suffered no ill effects.

synonyms.bx: 指品质、情况等坏的、糟糕的，或食物等有不良作用的，通常只作定语。

ex.chText: 他对对手发起了恶毒的人身攻击。
ex.enText: He authored a vicious personal attack on his rival.

ex.chText: 那姑娘被他恶毒的语气惊呆了。
ex.enText: The girl was shocked by the vicious tone in his voice.

synonyms.bx: 可用于修饰人或事物，强调有伤害他人感情或败坏其名声的意图的。

ex.chText: 你在公园里乱扔垃圾可真缺德。
ex.enText: It was wicked of you to drop litter in the park.
He'll be punished for his wicked conduct.

data.chText: 倒霉的时候（或日子、时刻）
data.enText: the time when you have to do sth difficult or unpleasant
an unpleasant drink that is a mixture of different things

data.chText: 给人以好（或坏）影响的人；保护（或毁灭）人的神魔
data.enText: a person or spirit who is thought to have a good/bad influence over you
the less unpleasant of two unpleasant choices

data.chText: 无法避免的坏事；不得已的事
data.enText: a thing that is bad or that you do not like but which you must accept for a particular reason

tr: the quality of being morally wrong in principle or practice
example: attempts to explain the origin of evil in the world

tr: that which causes harm or destruction or misfortune
the good is oft interred with their bones"- Shakespeare
example: the evil that men do lives after the

tr: having or exerting a malignant influence

value.def: Evil is a powerful force that some people believe to exist, and which causes wicked and bad things to happen.

example.ex: We are still being attacked by the forces of evil...
example.tran: 我们仍在遭受邪恶力量的攻击。

example.ex: There's always a conflict between good and evil in his plays.
example.tran: 他的戏剧中总是有善恶之间的斗争。

value.def: Evil is used to refer to all the wicked and bad things that happen in the world.

example.ex: He could not, after all, stop all the evil in the world.
example.tran: 毕竟他无法阻止世界上的所有恶行。

example.ex: ...those who see television as the root of all evil.
example.tran: 那些将电视视为万恶之源的人

value.def: If you refer to an evil, you mean a very unpleasant or harmful situation or activity.

example.ex: Apartheid is even a greater evil...
example.tran: 种族隔离是更大的祸害。

example.ex: Higher taxes may be a necessary evil.
example.tran: 提高税收可能会很不受欢迎，但却是必要的。

example.ex: ...a lecture on the evils of alcohol.

value.def: If you describe someone as evil, you mean that they are very wicked by nature and take pleasure in doing things that harm other people.

example.tran: 该国最邪恶的恐怖分子

value.def: If you describe something as evil, you mean that you think it causes a great deal of harm to people and is morally bad.

example.ex: After 1760 few Americans refrained from condemning slavery as evil...
example.tran: 1760年后，很多美国人都在谴责奴隶制的社会危害。

example.ex: They are setting an evil example for their children.
example.tran: 他们正给孩子们树立道德败坏的反面形象。

value.tran: 危害社会的；道德败坏的

value.def: If you describe something as evil, you mean that you think it is influenced by the devil.

example.ex: I think this is an evil spirit at work...
example.tran: 我认为这是恶魔在作祟。

example.ex: According to local folklore it is an evil place.
example.tran: 据当地民间传说，那是个不祥的地方。

value.tran: 受魔鬼影响的;恶魔的;不祥的

value.def: You can describe a very unpleasant smell as evil.

example.ex: Both men were smoking evil-smelling pipes.
example.tran: 两个男人都在抽着难闻的烟斗。

value.def: If someone is putting off the evil day or the evil hour, they have to do something unpleasant and are trying to avoid doing it for as long as possible.

example.ex: You can simply go on putting off the evil day and eventually find yourself smoking as much as ever.
example.tran: 你当然可以想方设法摆脱，但最后你会发现自己还是像以前一样拼命抽烟。

value.def: If you have two choices, but think that they are both bad, you can describe the one which is less bad as the lesser of two evils, or the lesser evil .

example.ex: People voted for him as the lesser of two evils...
example.tran: 人们投票支持他只不过是两害相权取其轻罢了。

example.ex: One suspects that hydro power is still the lesser evil.
example.tran: 有人认为水力发电仍旧是两害相较取其轻。

trans: 必要之恶；必要的恶；必要的罪恶；罪恶之源；必要的恶魔
杀意隆；邪恶的隆；杀意波动觉醒隆；杀意龙
必要之恶；必要的恶；必要的罪恶；罪恶之源；必要的恶魔
邪恶轴心国；邪恶轴心；险恶轴心；邪恶轴心--布什用语；险恶轴心国
邪恶的行为；罪恶的事实

partsOfSpeech.dec: de 加强 + vil 卑劣 → 卑劣到极点 → 魔鬼
de 加强 + vil 卑劣 + try → 卑劣的行为 → 恶行
e 加强 + vil 卑劣 → 十分卑劣 → 邪恶
re 一再 + vil 卑劣 + e → 一再做卑劣的事 → 辱骂〔别人〕
vil 卑劣 + ify 使… → 使别人成为卑劣的人 → 诽谤
vill〔= vil〕卑劣 + ain 表人 → 坏蛋，恶棍
